heroSection.title: Connecting The World Land, Sea, and Air
heroSection.subtitle: We cover worldwide shipping. Experience timely & secure shipping with our expert logistic solutions.

visionMissionSection.heading: SHAGA IS READY TO SERVE YOU
visionMissionSection.title: We provide logistics services for safe and on-time deliveries.
visionMissionSection.visionDescription: Connecting the world through global logistics, we deliver the highest credibility and efficiency with cutting-edge solutions that maximize benefits for all stakeholders.
visionMissionSection.missionDescription: Committed to advancing the global market across all sectors, by delivering seamlessly integrated logistics services with the highest levels of professionalism and accountability.

seaShipping.content: Customized logistics planning for optimal time and cost efficiency, scaled to your specific volume and delivery schedule. Services include Container Vessels, Breakbulk, RORO, and other specialized sea transports.

landShipping.content: Delivering to the Last Mile: From city centers to remote areas, we provide tailored, innovative solutions powered by seasoned professionals.

valuesSection.heading: CORE VALUES
valuesSection.title: Built on Trust and Professionalism.
valuesSection.subtitle: We prioritize strong, long-term partnerships built on mutual integrity and professional excellence.

trustItem.content: Executed thoroughly with integrity and accountability.

customerCentricItem.content: Balancing and prioritizing mutual benefits for optimal results.

innovationItem.content: Finding solutions through creative processes for the best results.

sustainabilityItem.content: Maintaining good communication as a means of sustaining every ongoing process.

transformingSection.title: Present at every strategic step as part of global market growth.
transformingSection.content: Supporting, innovating, and transforming in the logistics world through data and technology towards better growth.

workSection.heading: Workflow
workSection.title: Our Process in Action
workSection.subtitle: Through initial consultation, we custom-engineer your logistics plan and proactively map out measurable steps to mitigate all potential and anticipated risks.

steps.title: Comprehensive Consultation
steps.description: Analyze needs and problems, design execution strategy and budget, plan steps for execution and prevention.

steps.title: Strategy and Budget
steps.description: Adjust designs according to your business needs and goals through efficiency in possible sectors to achieve effectiveness.

steps.title: Execution and Prevention
steps.description: Carried out professionally by experts who maintain execution stability and take preventive steps against potential risks.

steps.title: Safe and On Time
steps.description: Safety and readiness of personnel, support, and mobility facilities are always our priority to ensure the integrity and safety of your shipment until its destination.

steps.title: Customs Services (PPJK)
steps.description: Simplifying your import and export customs clearance by ensuring all required documents are complete, updating the latest regulations, and bridging communication among all related parties.

list.title: Depot, Warehouse & Mobilization Management
list.desc: Providing a series of workflow services to support and facilitate mobilization, especially for hard-to-reach areas such as project sites (power plants, mining, etc.) with special trailers like multi-axle, lowbed, flatbed, dolly, goldhofer, logging, etc.

list.title: Cross-Border
list.desc: Serving domestic and international logistics chains for various types of cargo.

list.title: Service Types
list.desc: We are ready to design your logistics needs to and from various ports across Indonesia and the world, to and from all specific shipment destinations. Our services include door-to-port, port-to-port, and door-to-door solutions.

list.title: Project Cargo Handling
list.desc: No matter how complex your project logistics plan is, we are committed to providing the most efficient and innovative strategy and execution. Our survey planning provides a more realistic and measurable overview of implementation.

getInTouchSection.title: Start Streamlining Your Logistics Now!
getInTouchSection.content: Step into a world of seamless, barrier-free logistics, designed to propel your business forward.

footerSection.tagline: The Future of Urban Shipping Starts Here
footerSection.stayConnectedDesc: Join our community to gain exclusive insights and innovative solutions for all your logistics needs.

heroSection.title: About SHAGA
heroSection.subtitle: Prioritizing professional, premium service to drive mutual growth through strong collaboration.
heroSection.tagline: Driven by our dedicated team of committed logistics professionals

whoAreWeSection.heading: Get to Know Us Better
whoAreWeSection.title: Seamless mobilization. Guaranteed delivery. Our integrated logistics solutions cover everything.
whoAreWeSection.description: Our team is committed to delivering the best solutions for businesses of all sizes. Our goal is to provide quality service and minimize risk at every stage.
whoAreWeSection.quote: Simplifying problems with technology, enabling greater focus on growth in the global market.

featureSection.title: We Have Collaborated Across Various Industry Sectors
featureSection.subtitle: Contact us now to get logistics solutions tailored to your business needs.

stats.label: Years of experience in integrated logistics services both domestic and international
Commitment to safety and on-time delivery
Satisfied clients worldwide relying on our services
Warehouse coordination and communication for customer satisfaction

years.description: FFounded as PT. Geubrina Usaha, with a core focus on logistics services
Served as a project vendor for a Hydroelectric Power Plant in Western Indonesia
Leveraging strategic alliances with Freight Forwarders across key Indonesian and global port hubs
Rebranded as SHAGA to embody an expanded corporate vision and mission
Acted as a key logistics vendor for Foreign Investment and Hydroelectric Power Plant projects in Eastern Indonesia

gallerySection.heading: Our Fleet
gallerySection.title: Our Tractor Heads
gallerySection.description: Experience the journey of your shipment across our fleet, where every step is managed with precision, speed, and reliability. We ensure on-time delivery and seamless, end-to-end logistics.
gallerySection.footerText:
Supported by a team of drivers skilled across various terrains and levels of difficulty with a range of trailer fleets and tractor heads (highbed / flatbed, lowbed, dolly, sliding axle, multi-axle, etc.) operated by experienced personnel. We always prioritize safety and security with diligence and dedication in every trip.

We also provide supporting activities such as cargo stripping, warehousing, and mobilization to various regions with smaller fleets.
We also offer stevedoring services for breakbulk / LCT vessel cargo.

ctaSection.title: Your cargo is safe with us at every process and stage of shipment.
ctaSection.description: Our experienced team ensures your cargo is handled with great care, delivering safe and timely shipments at every stage of the process.

heroSection.title: Contact Us
heroSection.subtitle: Let us support your logistics requirements. Get in touch with our experts for collaboration opportunities, competitive pricing, and dedicated support.

findUsSection.heading: Find Us
findUsSection.title: Strategically located for easy access to all major logistics routes

faqs.question: What logistics services does SHAGA offer?
faqs.answer: SHAGA offers a range of logistics services including land and sea transportation, customs services, warehousing & distribution, supply chain management, cross-border solutions, last-mile delivery, and project cargo handling.

faqs.question: How can I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking feature on our website by entering the tracking number provided when the shipment is confirmed.

faqs.question: Does SHAGA provide international services?
faqs.answer: Yes, SHAGA provides international logistics services including cross-border shipping and customs solutions to help businesses access global markets.

faqs.question: How can I get a quote for my logistics needs?
faqs.answer: You can contact our sales team via the contact form on our website or reach out to us directly by phone or email to receive a customized quote for your logistics needs.

discussionCtaSection.title: Contact us to discuss how our services can support your business.

heroSection.title: Logistics Services
heroSection.subtitle: Our comprehensive logistics solutions are designed to optimize your supply chain and improve your business operations.

communitySection.description: Join a dynamic community of businesses and logistics partners to optimize supply chains and drive growth.
